entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 12:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: WSW 23 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
